txt.en:
'Peg Pruner, Captain Brackenbrook's quartermaster, needs some assistance gathering enough food for the refugees that have poured into the city since the brigands started their attacks.

'Now that Calder Cob's been exposed as a traitor, thanks to you, we need to make certain that we're watching out for the safety of the poor folk that lost their homes and livelihoods. If you think you might have the time or the desire to help, why not visit Peg and offer a hand?

'Peg is taking recruits at the north end of the main square of Archet. Just follow the main road further into town.'
'Constable Thistlewool sent you? I'll be sure to thank him. Able bodies willing to assist us are certainly the order of the day.\n\n'If you are willing, I have the work.'
'Peg is north of here, just up the road.'
The flood of refugees into Archet has caused a supply shortage, and Captain Brackenbrook's quartermaster, Peg Pruner, is having difficulty providing for the refugees.
Must be completed prior to the \qIntroduction.\q
Peg Pruner is at the north end of the Archet town square.\n\nConstable Thistlewool mentioned that Peg Pruner may need assistance gathering food for the displaced inhabitants of Archet.
